# Chrome Network Intercept Extension

## Project Overview
This is a Chrome extension that allows users to intercept, modify, and delay network requests.

## Technology Stack
- Chrome Extension Manifest V3
- Chrome Debugger API for network interception
- Vanilla JavaScript, HTML, CSS

## Key Features
- Override network requests
- Modify response data
- Delay responses
- Change status codes
- Rule-based interception

## Development Guidelines
- Use modern JavaScript (ES6+)
- Follow Chrome extension best practices
- Keep UI simple and intuitive
- Ensure proper error handling
